程序包 game

类 GuessOrSink

java.lang.Object
game.GuessOrSink
public class GuessOrSink extends Object
Enables the user to play a console game where they have to guess the letters in a randomly chosen word.
作者:
Foothill College, Yuwei Wu

  • 构造器详细资料

    • GuessOrSink

      public GuessOrSink(String inputFileName) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructs a GuessOrSink object which initializes the instance variables
      参数:
      inputFileName - input the file name
      抛出:
      FileNotFoundException - throws the exception if the file is not found

  • 方法详细资料

    • displayIntroduction

      public void displayIntroduction()
      A public method which asks the Ship instance for a String representation and displays the ship and a message introducing the current game.

    • play

      public void play()
      A public method which asks the user to guess a letter. Then, draws the updated ship if the user makes an incorrect guess.

    • getWinStatus

      public boolean getWinStatus()
      A public method which returns: - true, if the user asked guessed all the letters. - false, if the user has no remaining guesses, returns false.
      返回:
      winStatus

    • displayEnding

      public void displayEnding()
      A public method which shows the wordInPlay and whether the user has won the game.
